content.description: The following scatterplot shows the ages, in years, of 12 of the wealthiest people in the world along with their net worth, in billions of dollars. The data point at age 83 is labeled <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></math>.
content.question: Suppose point <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></math> is removed from the data set. Which of the following is likely not affected by the removal?

choices.label: The sign of the slope coefficient
The value of the slope coefficient
The sum of the squared residuals

content.answer: The sign of the slope coefficient

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
